Forget Password,TRCK-5,10282,Story,To Do,TRCK,Elevate-TrackingApp,software,mohamed nabil,557058:2c07a04a-80be-48d1-b644-1337dce99fa1,,Medium,,,,Abdullah Magdy,712020:52cad909-a9ea-404f-9ca7-203234de6d66,Abdullah Magdy,712020:52cad909-a9ea-404f-9ca7-203234de6d66,21/Dec/24 9:02 PM,08/Sep/25 2:26 PM,,,,0,
As a Driver

column1: I want to be able to make a new password
so that I can be able to login to app when I forget my password
column2: 1- user should be able to write his email

column1: 2- if email is not exist en error message should appear
3- if email is valid, a verification code should be sent to his email and user should be redirected to enter verification code
4- user should be able to send another verification code through email after 1 minute
5- if verification code is not valid an error message should appear
6- if verification code is correct user should be redirected to enter his new password and password confirmation . if password doesn't match each other an error message should appear
7- when user successfully changes his password he should be redirected to login page
8- OTP  Valid for 10 Minutes as of sending it, after which time it expires.
9- to resend OTP  be after count 30 sec
column2:
,,Abdullah Magdy,712020:52cad909-a9ea-404f-9ca7-203234de6d66,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@b6f7e1c,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,0|i000xu:,,,,,,,,,TRCK Sprint 1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,To Do,21/Dec/24 9:02 PM
Login,TRCK-3,10280,Story,To Do,TRCK,Elevate-TrackingApp,software,mohamed nabil,557058:2c07a04a-80be-48d1-b644-1337dce99fa1,,Medium,,,,Abdullah Magdy,712020:52cad909-a9ea-404f-9ca7-203234de6d66,Abdullah Magdy,712020:52cad909-a9ea-404f-9ca7-203234de6d66,21/Dec/24 8:59 PM,08/Sep/25 2:26 PM,,,,0,
As a Driver

column1: I want to be able to login to app
so that I can be able to make orders
column2: 1- Login should be through Email and password

column1: 2- if email is not valid an error message should appear
3- password length should be at min 6 chars . With upper case letter and a number at least
4- if password is not matching rules and error message should appear
5- user should be able to submit his data
* if server respond with error an error message should appear
* if login is done successfully then user should be redirected to home page and user data should be saved in local storage
* the application should be able to remember the user that logged in and saves user data
column2:
,,Abdullah Magdy,712020:52cad909-a9ea-404f-9ca7-203234de6d66,,,,,,,,,,,,,com.atlassian.servicedesk.plugins.approvals.internal.customfield.ApprovalsCFValue@4ac0fc24,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,0|i000xh:,,,,,,,,,TRCK Sprint 1,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,To Do,21/Dec/24 8:59 PM

As a User

column1: I want to be able to apply to app
so that I can be able to make a new account
column2: 1- Application fields should be

column1: (First legal name, Second legal name,Vehicle name,Email,ID number,Phone number,Password, confirmation password)
*phone number should be a valid phone number
2-User Should choose
(Countery, Vehicle type, Gender)
3-User upload
(license car photo, ID photo)
4- if some fields  is not matching validation rules an error message should appear
5- user should be able to submit his data
* if server respond with error and error message should appear
* if login is done successfully then user should be redirected to Login page
column2:
